title: What goes into the launch of a new irrigation product? - Landscape Management magazine
summary: Irrigation product development involves customer feedback, testing, and a focus on sustainability. Companies like Rain Bird and Hunter Industries use various methods to gather customer feedback and ensure their products meet customer needs. Both companies prioritize the development of low-impact products to address concerns regarding water use and scarcity.

title: Bang & Olufsen Introduces Beosound A5 Portable Speaker - eCoustics
summary: Bang & Olufsen's Beosound A5 is a new portable speaker that combines timeless design with immersive sound and sustainable materials. The speaker is made from natural materials such as oak and aluminum, and it is designed to be durable and long-lasting. The Beosound A5 is also versatile, with the ability to be used both indoors and outdoors.
